title: Nomads of the Serengeti
overview: Join veteran safari guide Jean Du Plessis as he takes you on an exhilarating trip through the Serengeti with migrating wildebeest. In this stunning five-part series, Jean follows the wildebeest on their odyssey across some of Africa's most incredible locales. With incredible, never-before-seen footage, Jean takes viewers on the expedition of a lifetime as a two-million-strong herd of wildebeest embarks on an 800 km, year-long journey of survival.
